trans-unit.source: Describes the timing of binding source updates.
trans-unit.target: 描述绑定源更新的计时。

trans-unit.source: The default UpdateSourceTrigger value of the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 默认 UpdateSourceTrigger 绑定目标属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value for most dependency properties is PropertyChanged, while the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text*> property has a default value of LostFocus.
trans-unit.target: 大多数依赖项属性的默认值是 PropertyChanged，虽然<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text*>属性具有默认值的 LostFocus。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text*>

trans-unit.source: A programmatic way to determine the default <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> value of a dependency property is to get the property metadata of the property using <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata%2A> and then check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.DefaultUpdateSourceTrigger%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式确定默认值<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>的依赖项属性的值是获取的属性使用的属性元数据<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata%2A>，然后检查的值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.DefaultUpdateSourceTrigger%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.DefaultUpdateSourceTrigger%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>

trans-unit.source: Updates the binding source only when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource*> method.
Updates the binding source whenever the binding target element loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 每当绑定目标元素失去焦点时，请更新绑定源。

trans-unit.source: Updates the binding source immediately whenever the binding target property changes.
trans-unit.target: 每当绑定目标属性发生更改，请更新绑定源。
